extendedInfo.description: Keep all your lists in one place.List Master Pro is designed to be easy to use, but still gives you the power to customize it to your list making style.List Master is flexible enough to keep your shopping list, todo list, store inventory, movie collection, or any other list you can think of in one place.  Customize to your heart's content with editable list types and renameable note fields.Features:-Sublists/Subnotes-Daily reminders-Voice Recognition (on supported devices)-CSV Import and Export to edit lists as a spreadsheet-Drag and Drop or automatic list sorting-Share lists via email-Backup lists to SD CardThere is an ad supported free version available as well.

reviews.title: Some good features - but no further developments.
reviews.comment: The few useful features are spoilt by the developer\'s lack of interest in addressing problems. Reminders & Auto Backup stopped working in January 2012 and the developer has still not fixed these issues. In fact, the developer states on his web site that this \"started as a side project to organize my own life\" - I suspect that he has done all the development he is ever likely to do. However, I still use this as one of three note/list apps - unfortunately I have yet to find a single app that will do everything I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: In my opinion the only thing that would make it better is the ability to link pictures to notes. Other then that this app is fantastic, thank you so much.
reviews.author: Josh Braun

reviews.title: Couple of issues...
reviews.comment: Works well but I can\'t import (not sure if this is due to 4.1 update) Would like to see linked phone/web & password.
reviews.author: Nicole S

reviews.title: Great app. but could really use cloud backup
reviews.comment: I like the app and use it regularly, but wish it included some type of online backup.  SD backup is nice if you have an SD card, I don\'t, Galaxy Nexus.  I lost my phone, along with my very large collection of ordered and maintained lists many of which where converted to the List Master Pro csv import format from my old phones task list app.  I can re-import them, but will have lost all my edits since the original import.  After installing List Master Pro on the new phone I was hoping the lists would magically reappear via Google\'s Android account backup like many of the features of my other Android apps, alas to my dismay they did not.  Not sure if that is an option with all Android apps.  Like another reviewer mentioned, cloud/cross-device sync could be a killer feature and I\'d happily pay more for it (i.e. why I bought Out of Milk Pro for my shopping lists).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tops
reviews.comment: The best, for what it is---a flat list editor. Even if you use a \"more powerful\" app such as a relational database you\'ll still have use for this and it\'s import/export. It\'s just so much easier to get certain hand-hacking done. And then sometimes a flat list is all you really need.
reviews.author: Derek Thomas

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: But can you add a search function?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail on Asus Transformer
reviews.comment: Unable to access menus at the list level.   Politely emailed dev twice, 4 weeks apart, no response.  Unfortunately I did not find the issue in time for a refund.  Go to a list, then try to add a sub list, or any other menu function.  Works great on a phone, but on a tablet, NO.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Backup lost
reviews.comment: Backup list lost, but ironically saved my settings.  Now I need to reenter 500+ movie titles again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best list app!
reviews.comment: Great app! Sublists & Subnotes. Customizable list templates. Easily customized interface. Very intuitive and easy to use. I\'ve it! Responsive developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best.
reviews.comment: Still the best tasklist app i\'ve ever used on any OS.  Great to see another update.  Add cloud/cross-device sync and you guys have it nailed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: List Master Pro
reviews.comment: Powerful and easy to use
reviews.author: Andre Branum

reviews.title: Best on market!
reviews.comment: I installed, bought and uninstalled MANY similar programs.  Its custamability and ease of file movement placed this one high above the rest.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs cloud sync
reviews.comment: Kinda outdated without it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it!  What would my life be like without all the lists I can make
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: That is probably the best app on the market. I find it indispensable. I use it for everything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome - Deep Functionality - Simple & Effective
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update please
reviews.comment: And make the holo ui
reviews.author: Sigit Pratomo

reviews.comment: Add multi-device sync, and it would be perfect
reviews.author: Steven Schwartz

reviews.title: Best app for lists and I have tried a dozen
reviews.comment: The sub list feature is great and linking an item to more than one list is great for shopping and chores. Try the free and move to the pro like I did.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t function without it. I depend on List Master Pro for anything I\'m SUPPOSE to remember. Love that I can speak my list with voice recognition.
reviews.author: A Google User
